description:
Legendary weapons for your officers from other DYNASTY WARRIORS forces will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Weapons for:
Diaochan, Lu Bu, Dong Zhuo, Yuan Shao, Zhang Jiao, Meng Huo, Zhurong, Zuo Ci, Chen Gong, and Lu Lingqi

■How to use
You can change Weapons from camp by selecting "Weapons" - "Equip Weapons".
name: Legendary Weapons Others Pack
